column6:
Still reeling from the new reveals about their lives and shocking betrayal of one of their own, the New Avengers press forward, trying to find a way to trust each other. All that and The Hood starts his takeover as Kingpin of the super-villains. So dust off your old Marvel Handbooks, because you will not believe who he is gathering to join him and who he kills to make his mark!,2007,8
Plus guest-star Deathlok!!!
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Comicraft | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | colorist:Dave McCaig | penciller (cover):Leinil Francis Yu
